title: Helen Flanagan reveals she 'can't WALK' after burning her foot on a shisha pipe
text:
She's been enjoying a fun-filled break away in Dubai with fiancé Scott Sinclair.

But Helen Flanagan was left worrying she wouldn't be able to walk at her sister's wedding in the Lake District after she burnt her foot on a shisha pipe.

The 29-year-old Coronation Street actress took to Instagram on Saturday to reveal that her foot had been wrapped in bandages.

Worried: Actress Helen Flanagan, 29, was worried she wouldn't be able to walk at her sister's wedding after she burnt her foot on a shisha pipe during her trip to Dubai

While sitting on a bed in a tracksuit, Helen said: 'I've got to catch a flight in one hour and to cut a long story short, I've burnt my foot on a shisha.

'Oh my god, I'm going to have to go on this plane in a bikini. I'm sobered up now, I'm eating a BLT sandwich.

'I've got to be a bridesmaid for my sister and my foot is like this. Apparently I can't walk on it. I've got to pack.

Injured: The mother-of-two shared a snap of her foot bandaged up with her 853K followers

'But what a fun night, it was really fun, I'll just have to be a big girl about it.'

The mother-of-two then shared more clips on Instagram including one of her sitting next to Scott.

After he jokingly said 'we're now on the plane and Helen's got a burnt foot', Helen hilariously pressed a button to put a divider between their seats.

Concern: Helen said on her Instagram that she was not supposed to walk on her hurt foot but revealed that she had a great night out in Dubai

Jokers: While on the flight home Helen hilariously put the divider up on Scott after he laughed about her burnt foot

The pair have appeared to have a great time on their break away, with Helen posting glamorous bikini snaps from the Le Royal Meridien Beach Resort and Nikki Beach.

Despite the worry, Helen made it to her sister Jane's wedding and her foot appeared to be fine and out of bandages in other Instagram story posts.

Helen has two daughters - Matilda, four, and Delilah, one. Adorable little Delilah was also seen at the wedding toddling around the hotel.

Disaster averted? Helen later shared a snap of her feet in front of a garden, without a bandage

Last week Helen joked she 'could have killed' Scott when she opened up about the birth of her eldest child during an appearance on Giovanna Fletcher's Happy Mum Happy Baby podcast.

Discussing going into labour the first time with Matilda, Helen said: 'I was 11 days overdue having contractions, and he was like "do you not think it is all in your head?"

The star said she called him 'all the names under the sun' before putting her own hospital bag in the car as Scott was 'doing his hair'.

Mum and dad: The happy pair, who are parents to Matilda, four, and Delilah, one, went to Nikki Beach on their trip to Dubai

Helen revealed that when they got to the hospital, she had yelled at the midwives to 'get him out', saying: 'I was looking at him thinking 'why isn't my mum here?'

'The second time wasn't much better. He looked a bit gormless, to be fair. They don't get it.'

Helen also discussed intimate details how she fell pregnant with Matilda, revealing she was conceived at her parent's home in Manchester, in the same room the star herself was conceived in.
description: The Coronation Street actress, 29, revealed that she burnt her foot on a shisha while in Dubai and was worried about being a bridesmaid for her sister in the Lake District while her foot was in bandages.
